title: Reel Estate Rip-Off
description: A real estate agent who didn’t like cycling or heights dies after riding off a cliff in the Colorado mountains, and the police label it suicide.The victim’s brother adamantly believes it was murder and hires me to investigate. After accumulating a list of suspects, from the victim’s irate previous client to a devious ex-wife, I realize a killer is on the loose.Someone is determined to keep the details hidden, but I will continue searching for the truth … even though it might cost me my life.
author: Renee Pawlish
